title: Welcome Home To Comfort! Cozy Up In This 1x1
posting_body: This is a 1 Bedroom, 1 Bath, approximately 669 Sq.
Life’s a vacation at The Preserve at Forbes Creek with our lush landscaping, paved walking path, and other high-class community amenities.
Our relaxing grounds feature dedicated grilling areas, sundecks, and outdoor ponds with unique water features.
It’s easy to keep moving here with three sparkling and inviting swimming pools and two jacuzzis.
Our health club-style fitness center features the latest Technogym cardio equipment and free weights.

Dishwashers, Private Balconies or Patios, Garages Available, Stainless Steel Appliances*, Gorgeous Views, Fireplaces, Custom Maple Cabinetry, Vaulted Ceilings*, Granite Counter Tops, Outdoor Storage Unit, Hardwood Style Flooring*, Washer/Dryer, Plush Carpeting, Walk-In Closets*

Abundant Parking, 2 Jacuzzi's (1 Indoor, 1 Outdoor), Playground, Lush & Serene Gardens, Cyber Cafe, 3 Sparkling Swimming Pools (1 Indoor, 2 Outdoor), Health Club-Style Fitness Center, WiFi Available, Carport Parking, Dedicated Covered Grilling Areas, Conference Room & Individual Computer Workstations, Basketball & Tennis Courts, Online Bill Payment, Onsite Maintenance, Paved Walking Paths, Package Concierge, Onsite Management
For more information about our pet-friendly apartments for rent in Kirkland, get in touch with the experts at The Preserve at Forbes Creek.
